question: [Calm] Nederlands: Bepaal the slope of the noisy line van de getekende lijn.

qas.question: [Calm] Nederlands: Bepaal the slope of the noisy line van de getekende lijn.
[Focus] Dansk: Giv the intercept of the noisy line for den viste linje.
[Brief] Dansk: Giv the value of y when x equals 1 for den viste linje.
